name: Protector Of The Light
description:
My first game made using construct 3.

I accidentaly discorvered this funky laser mechanic and decided to make a short game for this week's Trijam 92 (Waves of Light).

I obviously took more than 3 hours to make this game (~6hrs) so judge me harshly...

Enjoy the mayhem this game can create!

Controls:

  • SHOOT : left mouse button 
  • MOVE :  wasd

POWER-UPS

            + 1 light wave

            -0.1 sec reload

            + 0.5 wave size /  -0.1 wave length

            + 5 to wave magnitude

            +- 10 spread

             random gun
